properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| stats count() as invocations by bin(5m)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Invocation Rate (5min)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /completed/
| stats count() as total by bin(5m)
properties.title: Completed Invocations (5min)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /ERROR/ or @message like /error/ or @message like /failed/
| stats count() as error_count by bin(5m)
properties.title: Error Rate (5min)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /ERROR/
| fields @timestamp, @message
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Recent Errors

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| stats count() as invocations by bin(1h)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Hourly Invocation Trend

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/coach_companion-0ZUOP04U5z-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /Invocation/
| stats count() as total
properties.title: Total Invocations
